name: This Goes Deeper...
description:
Detective Deeper is laid low with a broken leg. Low on morale and funds a friend asks him to consult on a cold case that he expects will just be a paid holiday. But something isn’t right in the city and you can’t get the questions out of your head:






How to play:

Move around office with WASD press ‘E’ to interact. Can interact with filing cabinet, file on desk, newspaper stack, cork board and telephone.

Click on notepad to make notes that can be viewed on any screen.

Filing cabinet, file on desk and newspaper stack allow you to view case files, any files taken are saved to cork board.

Cork board used to sort through information.

Phone is used to interview characters to potentially get more information.

Post Jam Fixes:

Slight text changes to correct spelling and to provide additional necessary information.
